func combination(tags []string) (result [][]string) {
	length := len(tags)
	upperBound := 1<<length
	result = make([][]string, upperBound-1)

	for i := 1; i < upperBound; i++ {
		temp := ""
		for j := 0; j < length; j++ {
			if i>>j == 0 {
				break
			} else {
				if (i>>j)^1 == 1 {
					temp += tags[j] + ","
				}
			}
		}
		result[i-1] = strings.Split(strings.TrimRight(temp, ","), ",")
	}

	return result
}

gachaçš„å®ç°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åº¦ä¸ºå°æ•°ç‚¹åå…­ä½è™½ç„¶ç”¨intæ‘å†™å¥½åƒæœ‰ç‚¹æ€ªæ€ªçš„ï¼Œéœ€åœ¨å¤–éƒ¨æå‰æ‰§è¡Œrand.Seed()ï¼š
func gacha(alreadyGacha, count, fourStar, fiveStar, sixStar, sixStarCorrection int) (result []int) {
	result = make([]int, count)
	correctionSixStar := sixStar
	
	for i, _ := range result {
		if alreadyGacha >= 50 {
			correctionSixStar += sixStarCorrection
		}

		prop := rand.Int() % 1000000
		alreadyGacha += 1
		if prop < fourStar {
			result[i] = 3
			continue
		}
		switch {
		case prop > correctionSixStar:
			result[i] = 6
			alreadyGacha = 0
			correctionSixStar = sixStar
		case prop > fiveStar:
			result[i] = 5
		default:
			result[i] = 4
		}
	}

	return result
}

// CalculateTimeMap å°†æ—¶åˆ†ä¿¡æ¯è½¬æ¢ä¸ºéœ€è¦çš„æ•´å‹
func CalculateTimeMap(hour, minute int) int {
	return (hour-8)*60+minute
}

func CalculateDateStartEnd(l Lesson) (starts, ends time.Time, ending int) {
	DateStartEnd := strings.Split(strings.Replace(l.LessonStartEndDate, "å‘¨", "", -1), "-")
	TimeStartEnd := strings.Split(l.LessonStartEndTime, "-")
	LessonTipsStart := []int{
		CalculateTimeMap(8, 0),
		CalculateTimeMap(8, 55),
		CalculateTimeMap(10, 0),
		CalculateTimeMap(10, 55),
		CalculateTimeMap(12, 10),
		CalculateTimeMap(13, 5),
		CalculateTimeMap(14, 0),
		CalculateTimeMap(14, 55),
		CalculateTimeMap(15, 50),
		CalculateTimeMap(16, 55),
		CalculateTimeMap(17, 50),
		CalculateTimeMap(19, 20),
		CalculateTimeMap(20, 15),
		CalculateTimeMap(21, 10),
	}
	LessonTipsEnd := []int{
		CalculateTimeMap(8, 45),
		CalculateTimeMap(9, 40),
		CalculateTimeMap(10, 45),
		CalculateTimeMap(11, 40),
		CalculateTimeMap(12, 55),
		CalculateTimeMap(13, 50),
		CalculateTimeMap(14, 45),
		CalculateTimeMap(15, 40),
		CalculateTimeMap(16, 35),
		CalculateTimeMap(17, 40),
		CalculateTimeMap(18, 35),
		CalculateTimeMap(20, 5),
		CalculateTimeMap(21, 0),
		CalculateTimeMap(21, 55),
	}
	WeekDay, _ := strconv.Atoi(l.LessonWeekday)
	sD, _ := strconv.Atoi(DateStartEnd[0])
	eD, _ := strconv.Atoi(DateStartEnd[1])
	sT, _ := strconv.Atoi(TimeStartEnd[0])
	eT, _ := strconv.Atoi(TimeStartEnd[1])
	basicTime := time.Date(2022, 2, 28, 8, 0, 0, 0, time.Local)
	starts = basicTime.Add(time.Duration((sD-1)*24*7) * time.Hour).Add(time.Duration(LessonTipsStart[sT-1]) * time.Minute).Add(time.Duration((WeekDay-1) * 24) * time.Hour)
	ends = basicTime.Add(time.Duration((sD-1)*24*7) * time.Hour).Add(time.Duration(LessonTipsEnd[eT-1]) * time.Minute).Add(time.Duration((WeekDay-1) * 24) * time.Hour)
	ending = eD-sD+1
	return
}
